page.title: 04Mill Green
page.content: Mill Green is on a small road between Shudy Camps and Horseheath. There are not many people to play with here. I go to Castle Camps school.Every morning the school bus stops outside my gate at 10 to 9. I don't have to pay for the bus. It is usually on time.In Mill Green every house has got a garden.In my garden my dad has grown 2 weeping willows 1 crab apple tree 5 hdges 2 patches of rhubarb and a few more trees.About 100 yards away from my house there is a place where a moat used to be. My brother has just started school as he is nearly five. One other girl gets on the bus at my stop. I think I would like to live a bit nearer to a few other people. by Jason.
